Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Grease a 2-quart casserole dish.
Combine condensed soup, milk, and pepper in a bowl, whisking until well blended.

Pour the mixture over the potatoes and onions in the casserole dish, ensuring they are well coated with the soup mixture..checkBoxIf necessary, add more milk to ensure the potatoes and onions are almost covered by the liquid.
Bake for about 1 hour at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C), stirring halfway, until the potatoes are tender.
